notifyheartbeat.name: NotifyHeartbeat
notifyheartbeat.description: Grants permission to notify heartbeat for an active telemetry session

sendtelemetry.name: SendTelemetry
sendtelemetry.description: Grants permission to send telemetry for an active telemetry session

startsession.name: StartSession
startsession.description: Grants permission to start a telemetry session

stopsession.name: StopSession
stopsession.description: Grants permission to stop a telemetry session
